title: Interpretation of a black snake in a dream

preview.html: “They said they were false dreams, and we do not interpret dreams with two worlds (44).” Learn about the interpretation of a black snake in a dream in the various cases in which a snake appears in a dream and for all human beings, it is the basis of Almighty God’s message to many who deal with dreams. Heap dreams, dreams in their nature are divided into two types: visions, false dreams and true visions have their own connotations, and heap dreams also have their meaning. They should not be confused, as no one knows the unseen except God Almighty. We should not give more importance to dreams, and limit our lives to them. Today’s encyclopedia offers different interpretations of seeing a snake in a dream. Follow us. Interpretation of a black snake in a dreamSnakes are small snakes, but they are also frightening and are characterized by their length, predation, and killing. He can kill a man with all the tricks of snakes and serpents. They differ only in age. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is considered the most important interpreter of dreams in the world and seeing snakes in general sees the following: The snake in a dream, of a different type, symbolizes the enemies lurking in his life and sometimes shows the strength of faith that characterizes the dreamer. Seeing snakes repeatedly in a dream indicates the presence of a jealous person among his relatives and loved ones. If one sees one snake in a dream or sees many snakes coming out of the dreamer’s house. This vision expresses problems, worries, difficulties, and jealousy in his family life. Seeing a black snake, a black snake, or a black snake in a dream often symbolizes Satan, and other times it symbolizes an unbeliever. A person’s dream of a snake, a snake, and a snake without feeling fear symbolizes that person’s position in The hearts of others, where he shows his power and the goodness that comes to him. In some interpretations, seeing a snake exploding can symbolize the dreamer’s marriage, and the creation of a family life with his wife and children. Seeing a black snake, a black snake, or a black snake in a dream expresses the approaching hearing of sad news Unfavorable for the dreamer. Seeing someone in his dream introducing snakes into his house. This vision shows the presence of many enemies and haters in his life without him knowing them. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream Ibn Sirin explains the following: If the dreamer sees a snake in the water; This vision is good news about the coming of goodness and livelihood for the pioneer. A person sees in a dream that there is a snake that is talking to him affectionately. This dream symbolizes the popularity and acceptance of this person and may express the presence of a person acting in the dreamer’s life. Seeing snake meat in the dreamer’s home symbolizes problems and difficulties in his life. Seeing snakes in a dream also indicates the presence of many enemies that the dreamer will overcome, of different colors and sizes. A person sees them in his dream. The appearance of snake eggs in a dream represents the strength of enemies. If one sees in a dream that he is breaking snake eggs. This vision symbolizes the dreamer’s victory in a specific matter over his enemies. Seeing a person being eaten alive. This expresses the imminent victory over his enemies. If one sees a snake bite in a dream. This indicates the enemy's ability to...

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person praying in a dream, the complete correct interpretation

preview.html: Today we show you the interpretation of seeing a dead person praying in a dream. In this article, God Almighty said: “O leaders, benefit me from my dreams if they translate you into a vision (43).” Among the promising signs, and in today’s encyclopedia, we present all the interpretations related to seeing a dead person praying in a dream. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing a dead person praying in a dream. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of the dead person’s prayer in a dream. He whose father died saw his father praying at home. It is one of the praiseworthy visions that express the abundance of goodness, sustenance, and blessing that comes in the life of the dreamer. But if he sees that his dead father is praying in a corner, or in a place where he is not accustomed to praying. The vision symbolizes the need to link a certain action that the deceased performed in his life. Interpretation of a dream about the deceased’s parents praying. If one sees in a dream a dead person whom he knows, then he is praying in the dream. It is one of the visions that portends good. It indicates the high status of the deceased in the afterlife. Seeing the presence of a praying person in general indicates his good condition, and symbolizes goodness, blessing and reassurance in life, even if he is not actually praying. This vision is an indication of his good condition, guidance, and freedom from dangers. Interpretation of praying with the dead in a dream: If one sees himself praying with the dead in a dream. This vision symbolizes this person’s connection to the dead. Now you can interpret more dreams by browsing the instant dream interpretation application through the Google Store through this link and through the Apple Store through this link.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a full hijab in a dream for a single, married or pregnant woman?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing the hijab in a dream. Hijab is one of the duties imposed on a Muslim woman in her life. The hijab symbolizes the serenity and purity that characterizes a woman in her life. We will present to you the meaning of the green veil in the dream in full, the complete interpretation of seeing the colored veil in a dream, where we gathered wearing the black veil in a dream full of pot and the interpretation of the dream to wear. A veil for a man and a full veil in a dream for a married or pregnant woman, on the lips of leading scholars of interpretation of dreams and visions. If you are interested in knowing what is the complete interpretation of seeing a veil in a dream, then you should follow the article. Wearing a white veil in a dream is complete for a common woman. To see a girl’s plate in her dream, a white veil appears to her, is good news that their marriage is imminent, and God knows best. Also, seeing a veil in a dream indicates Nutrition, kindness, and achieving the goals and ambitions that a girl seeks in her life. Buying a hijab in a woman’s dream is good news, and it is one of the praiseworthy visions, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl wearing a full hijab in a dream indicates her prosperity, strength, and prosperity. Seeing a girl dreaming of herself taking off The veil is an unpleasant vision that indicates misfortunes and troubles in a girl’s life, and God is the Most High. What is the interpretation of seeing the veil for a married woman? Seeing the veil in a married woman’s dream is evidence of marital happiness and the stability of her life with her husband. Seeing the veil in a married woman’s dream indicates concealment, purity, a good reputation, and love. People for her in her life. Also, the good news of seeing a veil in a married woman’s dream could be the beginning of lactation with a soon-to-be pregnant and children, and God is more general. As was said in a dream about buying a veil for a married woman, it indicates the woman’s joys, goodness, and livelihood in her next life. As for seeing it A married woman in her dream when she takes off her hijab, this indicates problems and disagreements that may indicate that unpleasant things will happen to her, and God is the Most High. A pregnant woman indicates sustenance for the male, and God knows best what is in the wombs. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing the hijab in a dream is good news for her as it will end the problems and fatigue that the woman suffers from during her pregnancy, and God knows best. But seeing a pregnant woman taking off her hijab in her sleep is an undesirable dream. Which does not bode well at all, and God Almighty. What is the interpretation of a man wearing a hijab? To dream of a fully veiled girl for a young man is considered good news for him that the date of his marriage and engagement is imminent, and God knows best. Also, seeing the hijab in a man’s dream indicates kindness, livelihood, and a lot of The money that this person can earn in his life. To see the hijab in a man’s dream is a sign of achieving goals, ambitions, and happiness in the afterlife, and God Almighty knows best. To dream of losing his hijab. The interpretation of seeing the hijab lost in a dream is one of the visions that indicate missed opportunities and incompatibility in certain matters. Seeing a veil being stolen in a dream indicates some pain

title: What is the interpretation of seeing or hearing God’s greatest word in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing or hearing the word of God Almighty in a dream? Takbir in a dream is one of the dreams that pleases the one who sees it, as well as the verses of the Qur’an designated for legitimate ruqyah such as Surat Al-Falaq, Surat An-Nas, Surat Al-Ikhlas, and verses. The chair except for the prescribed supplication for this purpose, and God Almighty mentioned that this dream cannot come from him. God is greater in the dream for this vision and there are many indications, the most important of which is that whoever sees this dream will continue to repent and triumph over his enemies and attain joy and happiness. Ready evidence of the ease of the dreamer's matter and his good conditions if the vision is in a specific place, this means that good will happen in that place. Some jurists indicated that it is an indication of preserving the livelihood of whoever sees this dream and that he will obtain it as soon as possible, and repeating its saying symbolizes righteousness or increasing piety and righteousness. Some have indicated that it is purification from sins and choosing repentance and staying away from impurity and sins. Its statement is a strong victory whether on the professional, scientific or personal level. In another narration, that a person lacks the obligatory worship in religion, but God will guide him in these worships approximately such as paying zakat or zakat, or a person leaving his religion. Hearing the magnification or uttering it means repentance from a specific sin, getting closer to God, and staying away from the taboos that God has forbidden. Interpretation of listening to God is great in a dream When you hear this expression In your dream, the dream is a sign for you of sincere repentance, and hearing it indicates your intense desire for this repentance. The dream may also indicate a state of psychological conflict in the dreamer and his dissatisfaction with his circumstances. He has collected sins and transgressions. As for the unmarried girl hearing, it indicates that she will soon hear news that will make her happy. It can indicate relief from the anxiety and fears that the dreamer suffers from in his life. Seeing God Almighty say something wonderful in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream interpreter, the scholar Ibn Sirin, mentioned that this vision indicates that its owner glorifies God Almighty for the sustenance he obtained in reality. Interpretation of a dream saying God is Great in Al-Nabulsi As the scholar Al-Nabulsi mentioned, this vision indicates that this person feels very sorry for doing something if he said it during the dream. If he heard it, this indicates avoiding disobedience and sins, but if the corrupt person said it, it is a divine message asking him to change his life and get closer to God. In another narration, it can be interpreted as a warning to the perpetrator of sins to stay away from these behaviors and the person’s dissatisfaction with himself or his life because he committed many sins, which leads to the emergence of his anger during that. Dream of magnification in a dream. As for if one sees himself saying that God is greater, then his situation becomes better than what he is currently living or he returns to God Almighty and stops committing sins and transgressions or his victory over those who persecute him because of his closeness to God. Interpretation of a dream saying God is greater in Al-Nabulsi Interpretation of saying God is great in a dream of an unmarried woman If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is saying that saying God is great, then she will be relieved from the anxiety she suffers from

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing a turtle in a dream

preview.html: A turtle in a dream: There is no doubt that seeing a turtle seems strange or somewhat confusing, and given its essence, it is one of the good visions according to the majority of jurists and interpreters, and its connotations include goodness, livelihood, and reputation, as it is a symbol. Of piety, patience, wisdom, thought, asceticism, and fame. Evidence and situations related to seeing a turtle in terms of its meaning and the message it sends to its owner. A turtle in a dream. Seeing a turtle indicates wisdom and the ability to adapt to different circumstances, patience, certainty, and summoning knowledge to confront the winds of ignorance and wandering, and communicating with people of justice and knowledge, And abandoning strife and fun. Whoever sees turtles in his home, this indicates an abundance of profits and gains, good luck, and reaping a great benefit if it does not harm her. Also, the turtle symbolizes a woman who excels in her decoration and draws attention to herself. And whoever sees a turtle lying on the road, this indicates loss. Or unknown knowledge or contempt from the general public. Seeing it for the poor is evidence of abundance and benefit from knowledge. As for the prisoner, it indicates the length of his imprisonment and patience. Whoever sees turtle droppings, this indicates lack of livelihood. He sees a blessing in him. Miller. The turtle expresses matters of commercial and financial transactions and planning. Flour for the future and the start of fruitful projects. The turtle in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the turtle is a symbol of the righteous, ascetics, and scholars who are firmly rooted in knowledge and ascetics. Whoever sees the turtle, this is a sign of dignity, sincerity of intentions and heart, and getting closer to God with good deeds. Whoever bears witness to raising or feeding the turtle, this indicates On the tenderness of the heart, humility, compassion, and strength of faith. However, if he sees a turtle upside down, this indicates people’s aversion to scholars or the urgent need for support and seeking help. Whoever eats turtle meat will gain knowledge and wisdom, and eating its meat is evidence of gathering. Money and acquiring knowledge. Among the symbols of the turtle are also deception, concealment, and the summoning of cunning weapons. It is a symbol of knowledge, wisdom, asceticism, and religiosity, and it also expresses hermits. What is the interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a turtle symbolizes elderly women on the mother’s or grandmother’s side, and someone who guides the way. He receives good advice and guidance from them, and he may deal with an old woman and derive many benefits from her. If she sees small turtles, this indicates the approach of her marriage, the ease of her condition, and the end of unfinished business. However, if she sees that she collides with the turtle, then she is not honoring her sheikh, nor is she honoring her family, and she is rebellious. On her mother. And if she is engaged and hits the turtle, this indicates that she will enter into skirmishes and quarrels with her mother-in-law, but feeding the turtle shows respect for science, gaining knowledge and the fruits of labor, and reaping blessings. After long hours of waiting. What is the interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream for a married woman? For a married woman, the turtle symbolizes a mother or mother-in-law. If she sees a turtle laying eggs, this indicates her birth or pregnancy, and if the turtle talks to her, these are great benefits and advantages that she will obtain from advice for adults. .and

Interpretation of dreams about giving hair to someone in a dream. We did not find Clear meanings to see thatHowever, seeing hair in a dream can be a sign of goodness and benevolence, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees hair in a dream, this is a sign of high status, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees long hair, it may lead to a longer life, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation Dreaming of holding hair with your hand in a dreamInterpretation of dreaming of holding hair with your hand in a dream and touching hair could be a sign of kindness and happiness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees hair touching, it may lead to stability, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself touching your curly hair in a dream, it may be a sign of problems and obstacles, and God knows best. A girl was seen touching curly hair, as this may lead to some inappropriate people, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about curly hair in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my curly hair in a dream. Curly hair could be a sign of the idea of ​​traveling, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees curly hair in a dream, it may be This is a sign of kindness, and God knows best. If a married woman sees curly hair, this may be a result of marital problems, and God knows the unseen. If a pregnant woman sees curly hair in a dream, this may indicate good changes, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about all my hair turning gray in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about all my hair turning gray. In a dream, it can indicate worry and sadness, and God knows best. It can also express dignity and prestige, and God knows the unseen. When you see gray hair, this indicates longevity, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees the hair on her body turning gray, this may be a sign of corruption, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation Dreaming of wet hair in a dream. Interpretation of dreaming of wet hair in a dream could be an indication of the desire to get rid of mistakes, and God is Most High and Knows, as it can express the desire to wash and be liberated from sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. When a young man sees wet hair in a dream, it may be a sign of striving. To prosperity, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees her hair wet in a dream, it may portend goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about hair in the bathroom in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about hair in the bathroom in a dream can lead to difficulties and obstacles. If the dreamer sees hair in the bathroom, it may be a sign of Trouble, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about preparing for Hajj

preview.html: Dreams are always full of mystery and everyone is looking for convincing explanations for what they see in their dreams. In this article on the encyclopedia website, we will explain the dream of preparing for Hajj in detail. Seeing Hajj in a dream raises special feelings towards Hajj. Hajj is one of the sacred rituals in our true religion. Therefore, the dreamer is interested in learning the interpretation and meaning of every sign he sees in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about preparing for HajjDreams are this mysterious and unknown world about which we know little. Psychologists believe that the world of dreams is nothing but an expression of what is happening in the dreamer’s subconscious. He sees in his dream what he wants What he fears, what he aspires to achieve, etc. As a result, psychologists believe that you can learn about a person’s psychological state by looking at his dreams. The science of dream interpretation is a broad science with many different theories, and there are dozens of books that talk about it. But this science does not depend on clear scientific theories, rather it depends Mainly on guesses and conjectures. No one knows the unseen except God Almighty, and all destiny is in His hand, Glory be to Him. Therefore, you should not rely on interpretations of dreams and rely on God who is able to do everything. Interpretations of dreams vary depending on the dreamer’s condition, whether he is male or female, married, single, or otherwise. Interpretation of seeing Hajj in a dream: It often has good connotations and will be a good color. For the dreamer, God willing. Preparing for Hajj, according to most dream interpretation scholars, indicates, God willing, great blessings and abundance in the dreamer’s life in the near future. His preparation for Hajj here symbolizes his preparation for a new period in his life, which will be a period filled with contentment, stability, and happiness, God willing. This dream symbolizes change. The great and imminent positive sign in the near future, God willing, and these changes may be related to a professional level or a personal level. Interpretation of a dream about preparing for Hajj for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is preparing to perform the Hajj obligation, then this dream means, God willing, that there will soon be good news filling her home. And if He was suffering from distress and weak financial capabilities, so this dream is a sign, God willing, of short relief and a lot of goodness. God’s provision comes in more than one form, it can be in the form of money or it can be in the form of a blessing for children and income. Hajj in a dream symbolizes Safety, tranquility and reassurance, and Hajj is a religious ritual that has special sanctity and deep meanings in the soul of the believer. If there is something that disturbs the dreamer, distracts him, or saddens him, then this dream indicates with permission that relief is near, and he will see a lot of goodness and happiness in his coming days, God willing. Interpretation A dream about preparing for Hajj for a married woman may indicate a very good job opportunity for her husband, which will bring a lot of goodness and blessings to the home, God willing. If the woman is pregnant, then seeing Hajj or any of the religious rituals indicates that the birth will be easy, God willing, and the fetus will come in good health. God willing. Sometimes Hajj comes in a dream as a good skin and indicates the visit of the imminent dreamer

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman wearing a golden ring?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring for a pregnant woman: Interpreters believe that the dream carries many connotations that differ depending on the details of the vision, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of the vision about wearing a gold ring for a pregnant woman, married woman, or divorced woman, according to Ibn. Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation.Interpretation of a dream about wearing a golden ring for a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring for a pregnant woman.If a pregnant woman sees herself wearing a golden ring in a dream, this leads to many positive changes in her life after giving birth, and the vision promises her that her future is bright and that the days are coming. Her life will be happy. And wonderful. Gold in a dream indicates happiness in married life, love and mutual respect between the dreamer and her husband, and indicates a feeling of calm and peace of mind in the current period and relief from the tension and pressure that he suffers from. The previous period. In case the dreamer has doubts about her husband’s fidelity and dreams that he is giving her a gold ring, the dream is a warning to get rid of these negative feelings and trust her husband. If a pregnant woman sees herself wearing a gold ring in the shape of a rose, this means that her future child will be smart and successful And he will achieve many achievements in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman wearing a golden ring according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing many golden rings portends bad luck, as it indicates that some problems will soon occur in the dreamer’s life, causing her anxiety and spoiling her happiness, but they will end after a while. If she sees A pregnant woman in her dream that her husband is wearing a gold ring, this means that he will soon face a problem and will need support and attention from her so that he can get out of this crisis. If the ring that the dreamer saw in the dream has carnations and is a dull color, this means that a health problem will soon pass and he will be affected. Pregnancy negatively, so she must take care of her health and get enough rest. All the dreams that you are thinking of will find their interpretation here. Egyptian Dream Interpretation website from Google. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring for a married woman. If a married woman is going through a crisis and sees her husband giving her a golden ring in her dream, this means That he will provide her with support and stand by her side until this problem ends. If the dreamer has never given birth before, and she sees herself wearing a golden ring and feels happy during the vision, this indicates that her pregnancy is approaching and that God (the Almighty) will give her a beautiful child who will make her days happy. The dream indicates the dreamer’s success in working life and that she will take a step forward and learn a lot of skills in the coming period. If a woman dreams that she is wearing two gold rings on the same hand, this means that she will soon make some decisions and her life will change completely after making them. The dream may symbolize That she will be assigned a new task at work or bear a new responsibility in her personal life. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring for a divorced woman. If the divorced woman feels upset or is going through difficulties in her life, then the vision is a sign of easing her difficult matters and changing her circumstances for the better.

title: Interpretation of a dream about drinking milk

preview.html: As with any vision, the interpretation of drinking milk in a dream varies according to the dreamer of this vision, whether he is a man, a single girl, a married woman, or a pregnant woman. In addition to the difference in its interpretation and according to the symbols and indications of each vision separately, which differ from one person to another, and below we discuss the interpretation of drinking milk in a dream in detail as follows: Interpretation of drinking milk by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that if a person drinks milk in a dream, this is a sign of many good things, as he will get a lot of money or will occupy a prestigious position. As for the one who spills milk and falls on the ground, this indicates a huge loss that a person suffers from in his life. As for the one who sees himself drinking spoiled, expired milk, this is a sign that the fortuneteller has suffered humiliation and humiliation and suffered from confusion and dispersion in the affairs of his life, and God knows best. As for the one who sees impure milk contaminated with a little dust, this is a sign of his exposure to troubles and overcoming some obstacles and difficulties in his life. And whoever sees that he is distributing milk to people, this indicates distress, and whoever sees that he is trading in milk, this is evidence of the expansion of sustenance, the increase in money, and the advancement of work, and God knows best. Interpretation of drinking milk for an unmarried girl If an unmarried girl sees herself drinking milk in a dream, this has many good tidings, foretelling hearing good news, the coming of joy and happiness, getting rid of troubles and difficulties and removing sadness and anxiety. If she dreams that she is drinking warm milk, this is a sign that she will go through an experience or struggle, but she will overcome everything she faces in that struggle, and God knows best. Interpretation of drinking milk for a married woman A married woman drinking milk in her dream is strong evidence that God Almighty is pleased with her because it indicates that she will be blessed with good offspring and righteous children. Her visions also show that her biography is good among people, especially if she sees herself bathing in milk, as this is a sign of good reputation and behavior. Interpretation of consuming milk for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman drinking milk in her dream is one of the praiseworthy dreams. When a pregnant woman sees herself drinking milk in a dream, this indicates the ease and ease of the birth process, as well as her safety and the safety of her child, and that his health is good and she will receive a lot of joy and happiness in her coming days, and her condition changes for the better, God willing. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we will take your comments at the bottom of the article and we will provide you with the explanation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing Ramadan in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of Ramadan in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, the month of Ramadan is one of the last months of the year and the most blessed and abundant. It is the month that Muslims prefer and look forward to every year. There are many acts of worship imposed in this month, such as prayer, zakat, and fasting that God wants to purify. Regarding the interpretation of seeing Ramadan in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Ramadan in a dream Many interpreters believe that the month of Ramadan brings goodness in its days, whether in reality or in a dream. This holy month does not bring with it any problems or worries for a person. It is the month of the Qur’an, mercy, and blessings for all. Seeing it in a dream brings goodness and joy to all. And the seer even his fasting is evidence of consolation, the destruction of worry and the fulfillment of debts. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Ramadan in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees the month of Ramadan and fasts in it, this is a reminder for her to fulfill an old vow. The month of Ramadan for a married woman can be a sign of pregnancy and childbirth soon, if she has not given birth before. Seeing her fasting in Ramadan and not finding food for breakfast is evidence of some marital problems and disputes. Also, the month of Ramadan in a dream is evidence of the sincerity of this wife and the sanctification of her married life. Seeing her husband breaking his fast while fasting is a sign of a financial crisis in their lives. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Ramadan in a dream for a single woman A sign of the fulfillment of this girl’s desire to marry a good man or find a prestigious job. It also symbolizes the satisfaction of God Almighty with this girl. Facing life’s obstacles with ease and ease and success from God Almighty. It is possible that her desires will come true if she wants to travel abroad. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Ramadan in a dream, Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation Al-Nabulsi sees in the interpretation of the month of Ramadan in a dream that it is evidence of goodness and a sense of security and satisfaction in life. Also, seeing him fasting In this holy month, there is evidence of certainty of the things that bother him. Fasting is also evidence of relief from worry and anxiety from the distress of the afflicted, God willing. In the case of illness, it is evidence of recovery. Interpretation of a dream that I see that I am in the month of Ramadan in a dream about a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees that she is fasting the whole day, then she breaks her fast before the prayer time, this is evidence of a lot of lying, and the need to stop that. If she deliberately breaks her fast, this indicates exhaustion. As for if she sees that she is fasting the month and breaks her fast on time, this is evidence of her recovery from illness. Seeing her pregnant and fasting is evidence of her pregnancy with a boy. It also indicates relief from anxiety and anxiety and a reminder to fulfill the vow. Interpretation of a dream that I see that I am in the month of Ramadan in a dream by a person A man’s fasting in the month of Ramadan is evidence of health and safety from any disease. A person’s commitment throughout his fasting period in a dream is evidence of that person’s piety and attaining God’s satisfaction in his life. Spending the month of Ramadan in a dream is evidence of good livelihood and abundance of livelihood. It is also a reminder to this man of the necessity of fulfilling the vow he made. Some scholars see this as evidence of rising prices and rising prices. Interpretation of a dream Seeing the intention to break the fast in Ramadan in a dream. Commentators believe that seeing the month of Ramadan
